mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mps(cod, order_cod, product_cod, plan_date, qty, employee_cod, procurement, account, note, closing) VALUES (#{cod}, #{orderCod}, #{productCod}, #{planDate}, #{qty}, #{employeeCod}, #{procurement}, '완제', #{note}, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE orderdetail SET mps_state = 'Y' WHERE cod = #{orderCod} AND num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(RIGHT (cod,3) AS SIGNED)), 0) AS cod FROM mps
